title: Personal Portfolio Website
projectdesc: A responsive personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase my projects and skills.
ps: Photoshop design files for the website layout.
ppt: Presentation slides outlining the website's features and development process.

title: E-commerce Product Listing API
projectdesc: A RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js to manage product listings for an e-commerce platform.

title: Machine Learning Image Classifier
projectdesc: A machine learning model trained using TensorFlow to classify images into predefined categories.

title: Real-time Chat Application
projectdesc: A real-time chat application built with Socket.IO and React, allowing users to communicate in real time.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projectdesc: A data visualization dashboard using Python and Plotly to display key metrics and insights from a dataset.
